mapper.update: update SQL_SELECT set DATABASE_NAME = #{databaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELECT_CLAUSE = #{selectClause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FROM_CLAUSE = #{fromClause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHERE_CLAUSE = #{whereClause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_BY_CLAUSE = #{groupByClause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HAVING_CLAUSE = #{havingClause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_BY_CLAUSE = #{orderByClause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAM_MAP = #{paramMap,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETED_FLG = #{deletedFlg,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, DATABASE_NAME, SELECT_CLAUSE, FROM_CLAUSE, WHERE_CLAUSE, GROUP_BY_CLAUSE, HAVING_CLAUSE, ORDER_BY_CLAUSE, PARAM_MAP, UPDATED_AT, CREATED_AT, DELETED_FLG from SQL_SELECT where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ID, DATABASE_NAME, SELECT_CLAUSE, FROM_CLAUSE, WHERE_CLAUSE, GROUP_BY_CLAUSE, HAVING_CLAUSE, ORDER_BY_CLAUSE, PARAM_MAP, UPDATED_AT, CREATED_AT, DELETED_FLG from SQL_SELECT
